ProblemStatusCodelist-to-Condition-Clinical-Status-Codes (http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/snomed/ConceptMap/ProblemStatusCodelist-to-Condition-Clinical-Status-Codes)

Mapping from http://decor.nictiz.nl/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.40.2.5.1.2--20150401000000 to http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-clinical

ACTIVE. Published on Jan 4, 2017 3:27:28 AM by Nictiz (Nictiz: info@nictiz.nl). CC0

Maps the HCIM OverdrachtConcern release 2015 terminology for ProblemStatus to the FHIR STU3 terminology binded at Condition.clinicalStatus

name: ProblemStatusCodelist-to-Condition-Clinical-Status-Codes
title: HCIM ProblemStatusCodelist to Condition Clinical Status Codes
description: Maps the HCIM OverdrachtConcern release 2015 terminology for ProblemStatus to the FHIR STU3 terminology binded at Condition.clinicalStatus
purpose: To aid in mapping from HCIM OverdrachtConcern value set ProblemStatusCodelist to FHIR STU3 Condition.clinicalStatus
